description: Porth is a programming language created by streamer Tsoding. It is a concatenative, stack-oriented, and statically-typed language, based on the Forth programming language created by Charles H. Moore.
Programs written using Porth are saved in PORTH files. You can compile the program a PORTH file contains using Porth's com command.
